wikipedia_page.main: Colonel Christopher John Pickup  (born August 1942) is a retired British Army officer who was chief of staff and regimental colonel of the Army Air Corps. He was later secretary of the Royal Warrant Holders Association and was made a lieutenant (LVO) of the Royal Victorian Order in the 2007 New Year Honours.

response: * Christopher John Pickup OBE, LVO (born 1942), retired British Army officer
*Colonel Christopher John Pickup, O.B.E., Secretary, Royal Warrant Holders' Association.
